title: Polygon co-founder Jaynti Kanani steps down for the first time in 6 years
description: In a move that has sent ripples across the blockchain industry, Jaynti Kanani, the visionary co-founder of the renowned Polygon platform, has made the momentous decision to step back from his pivotal role in the project. This announcement comes on the heels of an illustrious six-year tenure, during which Kanani’s unwavering dedication, passion, and commitment ... Read more
